name: Magal Security Systems Ltd.
description: Magal Security Systems Ltd. is a leading provider of physical security and safety solutions, specializing in the design and implementation of integrated security systems for critical infrastructure and public safety applications. Founded in 1969 and headquartered in Airport City, Israel, Magal has established a global presence with projects in over 80 countries. The company offers a diverse range of products and services, including perimeter security, video surveillance, and access control systems, tailored to meet the needs of various sectors such as transportation, energy, defense, and homeland security. Magal is recognized for its advanced technology, including smart sensors, analytics, and software solutions that enhance situational awareness and response capabilities. With an emphasis on innovation and customer-oriented solutions, Magal aims to provide comprehensive security solutions that ensure the safety and protection of assets and people. As global security threats evolve, Magal remains committed to developing cutting-edge technologies that address the challenges faced by organizations and governments worldwide.
